member.name: T:OrchardCore.Users.Services.UserAuthorizationHandler
member.summary: This provides authorization when the permission request is ManageUsers and the current authenticated User has permission to edit any of the roles the user being managed is a member of. Callers should supply a resource
member.remarks: This handler will not be triggered when only requesting ManagerUsers permission with supplying an .

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Users.Services.UsersThemeSelector
member.summary: Provides the theme defined in the site configuration for the current scope (request). This selector provides AdminTheme as default or fallback for Account|Registration|ResetPassword controllers based on SiteSettings. The same is returned if called multiple times during the same scope.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Users.TimeZone.Services.UserTimeZoneSelector
member.summary: Provides the timezone defined for the currently logged-in user for the current scope (request).
